titleStmt.title: Robin Hood and Little John being an account of their first meeting, their fierce encounter and conquest : to which is added, their friendly agreement, and how he came to be call'd Little John : to the tune of, Arthur a Bland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W. Onley, and are to be sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date range of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
First line: When Robin Hood was about twenty years old.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland--Crawford Collections.
